thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 27 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Global Net Lease Reports Fourth Quarter EPS Of $0.09

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Global Net Lease Reports Fourth Quarter EPS Of $0.09
text:
Feb 27 (Reuters) - Global Net Lease Inc:
* GLOBAL NET LEASE REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 RESULTS
* Q4 REVENUE ROSE 26 PERCENT TO $66.6 MILLION * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.09 * QTRLY CORE FFO PER COMMON SHARE $0.51‍​ * QTRLY NAREIT DEFINED FFO PER COMMON SHARE $0.51 * NOI FOR THREE MONTHS ENDED DEC 31, 2017 WAS $59.8 MILLION VERSUS $57.7 MILLION FOR THREE MONTHS ENDED SEPT 30, 2017 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bengaluru Newsroom: +1 646 223 8780)
